item.title: Citizenship Amendment Act: Supreme Court to Hear the Plea in December
item.description: Citizenship Amendment Act: Supreme Court to Hear the Plea in December As the local organizations of Assam restart the protests against the CAA, the Supreme Court will start hearings on the top.
